title: New free champion rotation: Rek'Sai, Fizz, Varus and more!

replies.body: indeedi. i think at first riot added them in so people could try the champions and end up buying them (like a marketing scheme) and might have stopped. maybe she wasnt that popular or was too popular? also ty riot for varus  and i guess the WHOLE rotation <3 (wheres kennen)
Yi got replaced with Rek'Sai on the free-ro.
How is Reksai Easier than fizz?
Wow, I bought {{champion:114}} YESTERDAY, {{champion:7}} is one of my main mids and like 200 ip from getting {{champion:105}}, thanks riot...

Uh, no. There have been much more "OP" rotations in the season. Plus the use of "OP" proposes that your grammer skills are not up to date with today's society. Please advise this as it can help you in future reference. Thank you for your time, and have a bad day.
PLZ PUT SYNDRA ON FREE ROTATION... I REALLY WANT TO TRY HER OUT BEFORE I REALLY BUY HER... AND ALSO LISSANDRA...
She was on rotation a few weeks back

syndra = op :) 
she was so fun on poro
Please put {{champion:150}} , {{champion:39}} and {{champion:68}} , really wanna try them...

Do have I to repeat myself to you too? There have been MUCH more "decent" rotations other than this one. Plus, the way that you have used a picture in the use of a word just tells me that you SPELLING is not up to standard. If in need of assistance, please consult with a tutor, or just stop playing this game as that may be the reason for your downfall of spelling and grammer ;). Once again, thank you for your time in this very.......delicate discussion, and have a bad day.
